org.gvsig.raster.swing.buffer.impl.histogram.doubleslider

Class DoubleSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.gvsig.raster.swing.buffer.impl.histogram.doubleslider.DoubleSlider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class DoubleSlider
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
    DoubleSlider representa un componente que tiene dos deslizadores. Se puede definir un máximo y un mínimo.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
